sect1.title: Build Variables
sect1.para: Setup target-specific variables for the compiler and linkers:

screen.userinput: cat << "EOF" >> ~/.bashrc export CC="${CLFS_TARGET}-gcc" export CXX="${CLFS_TARGET}-g++" export AR="${CLFS_TARGET}-ar" export AS="${CLFS_TARGET}-as" export RANLIB="${CLFS_TARGET}-ranlib" export LD="${CLFS_TARGET}-ld" export STRIP="${CLFS_TARGET}-strip" EOF source ~/.bashrc
